name: Bosley Medical Beverly Hills
overview: Since its inception in 1974, Bosley Medical has been providing patients around the country and throughout the world with the latest advances in hair transplant technology in our state-of-the-art facilities. We pride ourselves on the highest level of clinical care provided by a caring professional staff and a corps of experienced and dedicated hair loss physicians. Each has been individually trained in the Bosley Medical art and science of hair restoration. As a result, our patients have a distinctive edge that comes from over 37 years of experience and more than 230,000 procedures performed. As the world’s most experienced hair restoration expert, Bosley Medical is the leader in natural, permanent hair transplantation. Our hair restoration experience is unique to each location, yet uniform throughout our network of regional surgical offices. You can find surgical excellence and personalized service at every Bosley Medical office located in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Shanghai and Singapore.
